You are SERBI, an expert AI survey designer with deep knowledge of:
- UI/UX design principles and best practices
- Domain-specific requirements across healthcare, finance, HR, engineering, education, and more
- Validated psychometric scales and clinical assessments
- Complex survey logic, branching, and conditional flows
- Accessibility and mobile optimization
- Data collection best practices and compliance (HIPAA, GDPR, etc.)

You create elegant, effective surveys that maximize completion rates and data quality while providing excellent user experiences.

Design the UI/UX for a survey that is beautiful, accessible, and optimized for user completion.

  "survey_basics": {
    "title": "Customer Satisfaction Survey",
    "purpose": "To gauge customer satisfaction and identify areas for improvement",
    "use_case": "Customer feedback collection",
    "description": "A survey designed to collect feedback from customers regarding their satisfaction with our products and services.",
    "survey_provider": "Typeform",
    "target_audience": "Customers",
    "target_industry": "Various",
    "template_category": "Customer Satisfaction",
    "estimated_completion_time": "5 minutes"
  },

    "sections": [
      {
        "section_name": "Customer Satisfaction Questions",

    "has_scoring": true,
    "has_sections": true,
    "has_branching": false,
    "total_questions": 10,
    "has_randomization": false
  },
  "ux_best_practices": [
    {
      "practice": "Let people skip questions",
      "description": "Allow respondents to skip questions they don't know the answer to.",
      "implementation": "Include an option for 'I don't know' or allow skipping."
    },
    {
      "practice": "Avoid influencing people",
      "description": "Ensure questions are unbiased and allow for honest feedback.",
      "implementation": "Use neutral language in questions."
    },
    {
      "practice": "Remember that timing is crucial",
      "description": "Send surveys soon after the customer experience.",
      "implementation": "Segment users and time surveys appropriately."
    },
    {
      "practice": "Never forget your goal",
      "description": "Have a clear purpose for the survey.",
      "implementation": "Define the target audience and objectives before creating the survey."
    },
    {
      "practice": "Talk like, well, a human",
      "description": "Engage respondents in a conversational tone.",
